alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 13 at 1:23AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Gilchrist, west central Bradford, northwestern Alachua and south central Columbia Counties through 200 AM EST... At 123 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near High Springs to 6 miles northwest of Manattee Road. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Alachua, High Springs, Sampson, Newberry, La Crosse and Brooker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Western Alachua
